content: समुदित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Gone up, risen, ascended. {@--2@} Lofty, elevated. {@--3@} Produced, arisen, occasioned. {@--4@} Assembled, collected, united; मद्भाग्योपचयादयं समुदितः सर्वो गुणानां गणः <ls>Ratn. 1. 6.</ls> {@--5@} Possessed of, furnished with. {@--6@} Conversed. {@--7@} Spoken to, addressed. {@--8@} Agreed upon. {@--9@} Customary, usual.
